code:
%% Project Burndown Chart
%% Save as: img/project-burndown-chart.png
%% 
%% This is the data for the burndown chart. Use Excel, Google Sheets, 
%% or a charting tool to create the visual burndown chart.

xychart-beta
    title "Project Burndown Chart - Story Points Remaining"
    x-axis ["Start", "S1", "S2", "S3", "S4", "S5", "S6", "S7", "S8"]
    y-axis "Story Points Remaining" 0 --> 220
    line "Ideal Burndown" [210, 183.75, 157.5, 131.25, 105, 78.75, 52.5, 26.25, 0]
    line "Actual Burndown" [210, 186, 158, 127, 103, 86, 55, 34, 0]
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 首先，我们需要定义流程的起点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Generic Diagram的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Generic Diagram结束。
